demolition

Class GamePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GamePlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BombGuy, RedEnemy, YellowEnemy

    public abstract class GamePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract class represeting players including enemies and controlled player(Bomb Guy).

      • addPlayerSprites

        public void addPlayerSprites(java.lang.String folderName,
                             java.lang.String fileName,
                             App app)
        Loads player sprites from the given folder and file.
        Parameters:
        folderName - : name of the folder under src/main/resources
        fileName - : name of the sprite to be stored in. Eg. Bomb Guy, Yellow Enemy, Red Enemy
        app - : an instance of App in order to get access to method for loading image from file system

      • getPlayerImage

        public java.util.List<PImage> getPlayerImage(Orientation direction)

      • move

        public abstract void move(java.lang.String[][] grid)
        This is an abstract method implemented by each player with distinct move behaviour.
        Parameters:
        grid - presents the txt file into 2D String array

      • draw

        public void draw(PApplet pApp,
                 Orientation direction)

        Draws the sprite into the app window with given direction. It takes the orientation as key and gets the list of sprites as values from the map container. Then on each time draw method is called index of the sprites list gets incremented in order to show the transition in the animation process.

        Parameters:
        pApp - is an instance of App
        direction - is the orientation of type Orientation

      • canMoveTo

        protected boolean canMoveTo(java.lang.Integer[] coord,
                            java.lang.String[][] grid)
        Parameters:
        coord - neighbour x and y coordinates of the current player
        grid - presents the txt file into 2D String array
        Returns:
        if player can move arround the empty tile
